downloadTitle: Microsoft Dynamics AX 2012 R2 Installation Guide for Cumulative Update 7
downloadDescription: This document explains how to install cumulative update 7 for Microsoft Dynamics AX 2012 R2 (CU 7).
detailsSection:
The installation guide describes the following methods for installing CU 7:
  • In an existing Microsoft Dynamics AX 2012 R2 installation, apply CU 7 as an update.
  • For a new Microsoft Dynamics AX 2012 R2 installation, use slipstreaming to install CU 7 along with the rest of the product.
systemRequirementsSection:
• To view the PDF file, you will need a PDF reader, such as the free Adobe Reader.
  • For information about the system requirements for Microsoft Dynamics AX 2012, see System requirements for Microsoft Dynamics AX 2012.
installInstructionSection:
1. Click Download to download the manual in PDF file format.
  2. Save the file to your computer.
